content: अवि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> [अव्-इन्] Favourable, kindly or favourably disposed. --विः {@--1@} A sheep; ({%<ab>f.</ab>%} also in this sense); जीनकार्मुकवस्तावीन् <ls>Ms. 11. 139</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 6</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 55.</ls> {@--2@} The sun. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (अर्क). {@--4@} A goat. {@--5@} A mountain. {@--6@} Air, wind. {@--7@} A woollen blanket (of the skin of mice). {@--8@} A blanket, shawl in general. {@--9@} A woollen strainer (for Soma juice). {@--10@} A master. {@--11@} A wall, enclosure. {@--12@} A rat. --विः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} An ewe. {@--2@} Shame. {@--3@} A woman in her courses. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%ovis%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%ois%}].
